snippet: Malala Yousufzai, who was attacked for advocating education for girls Pakistan, was in stable condition after two operations to reconstruct her skull and restore her hearing.
lead_paragraph: Malala Yousufzai, who was attacked for advocating education for girls Pakistan, was in stable condition after two operations to reconstruct her skull and restore her hearing.

headline.seo: Pakistani Girl Shot by Taliban Is Stable After Surgeries
headline.main: Schoolgirl Shot by the Taliban Is Progressing
headline.print_headline: Schoolgirl Shot By the Taliban Is Progressing
